block.splendid_slimes.slime_spawner.bree: Use a Slime Spawn Egg to set the Slime Breed.
info.splendid_slimes.slime_heart: Place in Slime Incubator to grow!
info.splendid_slimes.slime_vac: Shoots item in opposite hand. Use while sneaking to suck up Slimes/Items.
slime.splendid_slimes.all_seeing.info: Can read your fortune, but has no way of telling you what it is.
slime.splendid_slimes.bitwise.info: Respects your redstone contraptions enough to not mess with them, even when angry.
slime.splendid_slimes.blazing.info: These Slimes are cold to the touch, getting most of their heat from their environment.
slime.splendid_slimes.bony.info: They don't know how to drink milk without absorbing the bucket with it...
slime.splendid_slimes.boomcat.info: The most commonly domesticated Slime. Also the most commonly responsible for broken glassware.
slime.splendid_slimes.ender.info: Known to cause a spacial distortions when upset.
slime.splendid_slimes.gold.info: These Slimes yearn for the mines...
slime.splendid_slimes.luminous.info: Don't turn off the lights! These are afraid of the dark...
slime.splendid_slimes.minty.info: Only eats monsters, making this a more delicate Slime to ranch.
slime.splendid_slimes.orby.info: When not observed, Orby Slimes sort books according to the nonsensical Slimy Decimal System.
slime.splendid_slimes.phantom.info: Happy slimes often steal bad dreams from those around them.
slime.splendid_slimes.prisma.info: The springier cousin of the Puddle slime, more attracted to bright colors.
slime.splendid_slimes.puddle.info: These Slimes love swimming! If only they were good at it...
slime.splendid_slimes.rotting.info: Often found in dumpsters behind restaurants. Friends with raccoons!
slime.splendid_slimes.shulking.info: Domesticated Slimes are often used in emergencies to lift debris.
slime.splendid_slimes.slimy.info: The most basic of Splendid Slimes. Perfect for beginner ranchers!
slime.splendid_slimes.sweet.info: Those with a sweet tooth might enjoy taking a bite out of its peppermint ribbon.
slime.splendid_slimes.webby.info: Its Plorts are used by skilled seamsters to create fine clothing.
slime.splendid_slimes.weeping.info: An ancestor of the Boomcat that got trapped in the Nether and adapted to the harsh environment.
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_corra: Use Corral Blocks to keep Slimes contained
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_feede: Craft a Slime Feeder to automatically feed Slimes with tricky diets.
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_incub: Craft a Slime Incubator to incubate Slime Hearts into Slimes
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_plort: Feed a Slime and collect a Plort
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_press: Craft a Plort Press to press Slime Hearts
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_rippi: Craft a Plort Rippit to turn Plorts into usable resources
splendid_slimes.advancement.root.title: Splendid Slimes
trait.splendid_slimes.aquatic.info: Slime Sinks in water and gets unhappy when not in it.
trait.splendid_slimes.aquatic.name: Aquatic
trait.splendid_slimes.defiant.info: Slime will have a chance to survive a killing blow positively correlated to the damage of the attack.
trait.splendid_slimes.defiant.name: Defiant
trait.splendid_slimes.explosive.info: When hungry, Slime will periodically cause explosions that don't break blocks. Their frequency increases with hunger.
trait.splendid_slimes.explosive.name: Explosive
trait.splendid_slimes.feral.info: Slime will always attack the player.
trait.splendid_slimes.feral.name: Feral
trait.splendid_slimes.flaming.info: Slime will light mobs it touches on fire Slime and periodically create fire. The frequency of fire increases with hunger.
trait.splendid_slimes.flaming.name: Flaming
trait.splendid_slimes.floating.info: Slime will occasionally levitate for a few seconds.
trait.splendid_slimes.floating.name: Floating
trait.splendid_slimes.foodporting.info: Slime will teleport to food items and entities it targets to eat.
trait.splendid_slimes.foodporting.name: Foodporting
trait.splendid_slimes.handy.info: Slime can be given an item to hold. It will drop when killed or split.
trait.splendid_slimes.handy.name: Handy
trait.splendid_slimes.largoless.info: Slime cannot be made into a Largo. Its Plorts cannot make other Slimes into a Largo.
trait.splendid_slimes.largoless.name: Largoless
trait.splendid_slimes.moody.info: Happiness increases and decreases are doubled.
trait.splendid_slimes.moody.name: Moody
Slime will get unhappy when they aren't in direct sunlight
trait.splendid_slimes.picky.info: A Slime made into a largo will get angry if it eats from the same diet twice in a row.
trait.splendid_slimes.picky.name: Picky
trait.splendid_slimes.spiky.info: Slime will hurt players they touch.
trait.splendid_slimes.spiky.name: Spiky
